price: Бас, бизга Парвардигоримизнинг сўзи ҳақ бўлди. Энди биз аниқ тотгувчилармиз.
arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faḥaqqa ʿalaynā qawlu rabbinā innā ladhāiqūna
